idea:
Starting out as a catering and house keeping, manpower supply  service in Thane back in 2009 we have now emerged as one of the leading Integrated Service providers. We started as a small catering enterprise with bigger goals and vision. Through continuous hard work and excellence we have metamorphosed as sustainable and successful venture. From rendering catering services to rendering more wholesome and comprehensive solutions, the last ten years have been a period of evolution for our company.

We have more than a decade of experience and expertise to offer that we leverage while providing best in market services to our customers. We have expanded services to on-site and off-site venues. We have always welcomed change and have constantly reconfigured our business design to meet the market landscape.

Quality has always been our top priority.On-time delivery, our work ethos and quality of services we provide have blessed us with happy customers who have returned time and again to avail our services.

We boost of an extensive client base that we owe by sticking to our core principles and our adaptable business model.

We have an efficient and highly qualified workforce to ensure round the clock services to our client in the most innovative and functionally potent manner.
name: WELLDONE INTEGRATED SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

Using photo wallpaper, one can rapidly alter the appearance of their house or office. Our Picture Collection comprises the very best digital photographs that were accessible at the time and were selected after a painstaking process.
name: TETSIP INFRASTRUCTURE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Indian School of Image Management (ISIM) is the first Indian educational institute to provide internationally recognized programs approved in the field of Image Consulting & Soft Skills.


Today, the institute’s groundbreaking academic programs carry forward that mission, making ISIM, the top Image Consulting & Soft Skills Institute in India & among the very best globally. The school is based out of Mumbai, New Delhi, Bengaluru, and Mauritius offering short and long-term professional programs.
name: Indian School of Image Management
